settings.subtitle: Feel the ground. Move naturally. Live fully.
settings.body_text: Genuine comfort comes from letting your feet do what's natural — bending, flexing, moving, feeling. Our customers say it's "life-changing." Find out why Xero Shoes let you move the way nature intended.

settings.text: A dress shoe that delivers comfort in every step.

settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.
Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: Wider, foot-shaped toe boxes let your toes spread and relax. A “Xero-drop” non-elevated heel for proper posture.

settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: Low-to-the-ground design for balance and agility, with a just-right combination of protection and sensory feedback.

settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: Our patented FeelTrue® soles let your feet bend and flex naturally, and are backed by our 5,000-mile sole warranty.

settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: Wide toe boxes let your toes spread, giving you that natural, free, feeling of being in bare feet.

settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.
Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: "Xero Shoes are so lightweight I practically feel like I’m flying!"
settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: “My Xero Shoes were life changing. I've never been so comfortable in shoes before!”
settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: "Wow, unreal! Having a wide toe box on a basketball shoe is game changing...I just wish I had these growing up!"
settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: Let's find the most comfortable shoe for everything you do.
Get trainer tips for transitioning to the X1 barefoot basketball shoe.

settings.text: Build it to last, use less, and source better. We’re committed to ensuring all our materials are safe, and that they are sourced ethically.

settings.text_fallback: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text: We're so confident regarding the quality of our shoes, every pair comes with a 5,000 mile sole warranty!
